name: Banonkey\u2122Town: A Game Series for Mobile and Mac/PC
blurb: An episodic 3D action/adventure game series that combines an ever-thickening plot with continually expanding gameplay.

rewards.reward: Receive a digital copy of the Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace.
Receive a  digital copy of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace, and your name in Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode Two.
Receive a digital art book of Banonkey\u2122 Town, a  digital copy of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and your name in Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode Two.

Receive a  digital copy of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace PLUS a digital copy of the Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode Two, your name in Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode Two and the digital art book.
Receive a Banonkey\u2122 Town Poster of your choice in addition to digital copies of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and Episode Two, your name in Episode Two and the digital art book.
Receive a Banonkey\u2122 Town t-shirt of your choice, digital copies of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and Episode Two, your name in Episode Two and the digital art book.

Receive a chance Banonkey\u2122 Town Zoo (BTZ) Tag, a Banonkey\u2122 Town poster of your choice, the digital copies of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and Episode Two, your name in Episode Two, and the digital art book.

Receive a Banonkey\u2122 Town t-shirt of your choice, one Banonkey\u2122 Town poster of your choice, the digital copies of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and Episode Two, your name in Episode Two, and the digital art book.

Receive a chance Banonkey\u2122 Town Zoo (BTZ) Tag, a Banonkey\u2122 Town t-shirt of your choice, one Banonkey\u2122 Town poster of your choice, the digital copies of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and Episode Two, your name in Episode Two, and the digital art book.

Receive TWO chance Banonkey\u2122 Town Zoo (BTZ) Tags, TWO Banonkey\u2122 Town t-shirts of your choice, one Banonkey\u2122 Town poster of your choice, the digital copies of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and Episode Two, your name in Episode Two, and the digital art book.

Help the development team NAME a person, place or thing in an upcoming Banonkey\u2122 Town episode. In addition, receive THREE chance Banonkey\u2122 Town Zoo (BTZ) Tags, TWO Banonkey\u2122 Town t-shirts of your choice, ONE Banonkey\u2122 Town poster of your choice, the digital copies of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and Episode Two, your name in Episode Two, and the digital art book.

Help the development team NAME a person, place or thing in an upcoming Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode.  In addition, receive FOUR chance Banonkey\u2122 Town Zoo (BTZ) Tags, TWO Banonkey\u2122 Town t-shirts of your choice, TWO Banonkey\u2122 Town posters of your choice, two digital copies each of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and Episode Two, your name in Episode Two, and the digital art book.

Immortalize something meaningful to you in the Banonkey\u2122 Town game. Send us a photo of a memento (with discretion) and we'll turn it into a charming part of the game. You will also receive a character figurine of the Banonkey\u2122 Town Chimp with our thanks and your name on the base. You will receive FOUR chance Banonkey\u2122 Town Zoo (BTZ) Tags, TWO Banonkey\u2122 Town t-shirts of your choice, TWO Banonkey\u2122 Town posters of your choice, two digital copies each of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and Episode Two, your name in Episode Two, and the digital art book.

Help the development team DESIGN a person or thing based on your inspiration in an upcoming episode.  In addition, immortalize something meaningful to you in the Banonkey\u2122 Town game. Send us a photo of a memento (with discretion) and we'll turn it into a charming part of the game.  Receive TWO character figurines of the Banonkey \u2122Town Chimp with our thanks and your name and the name of a friend on one base each.  You will receive FOUR chance Banonkey\u2122 Town Zoo (BTZ) Tags, THREE Banonkey\u2122 Town t-shirts of your choice, TWO Banonkey\u2122 Town posters of your choice, two digital copies each of Banonkey\u2122 Town Episode One: Monkey Menace and Episode Two, your name in Episode Two, and the digital art book.
